title: Democrats seek ‘immediate answers’ after reported arrests of firefighters by US border agents
description: Senator Patty Murray calls Trump’s immigration policy ‘fundamentally sick’ after incident in Washington state
body:
Patty Murray, the Washington senator, has called for the Trump administration to provide “immediate answers” about reports that two firefighters were detained by border agents as they were responding to a wildfire in the state.

title: Jan. 6 rioter Ashli Babbitt offered full military funeral, Air Force confirms
description: The Air Force offered full military funeral honors to Ashli Babbitt, the rioter who was fatally shot by police as she stormed the U.S. Capitol.
body:
The Air Force has offered full military funeral honors to Ashli Babbitt, the rioter who was fatally shot by police as she stormed the U.S. Capitol during the Jan. 6 riot four years ago, officials said Thursday.
Babbitt, 35, was an Air Force veteran w... [1930 chars]

title: Report: "Several teams" have spoken to Cowboys about a Micah Parsons trade
description: Cowboys are, for the first time, willing to listen.
body:
Four weeks ago tomorrow, Cowboys linebacker Micah Parsons asked to be traded. Cowboys owner and G.M. Jerry Jones shrugged it off as a negotiation tactic.
He’s reportedly not shrugging now.

title: Paramore’s Hayley Williams Officially Releases New Album Ego Death at a Bachelorette Party
description: The follow-up to Flowers for Vases / Descansos collects the 17 songs that Williams shared earlier this summer
body: Hayley Williams of Paramore has released a new solo album comprised of the 17 tracks shared earlier this summer and the new bonus song “Parachute.” Ego Death at a Bachelorette Party is out now on streaming services, with physical releases arriving on... [1284 chars]
